entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
